item.title: Garden Bot - Telegram Weather Bot for Gardeners
item.description: Smart Telegram bot that sends weather notifications to help gardeners make informed decisions about their plants and crops.

item.title: Building Garden Bot: From Idea to Production Telegram Bot
item.description: Deep dive into building Garden Bot - a weather notification Telegram bot for gardeners. Learn about architecture decisions, API integrations, deployment strategies, and real-world challenges.
